message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to get a head start on your goals. I've had excellent feedback from previous customers, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase. What do you think?
Thank you for the recommendation, Alice. Based on your positive feedback and the price, I believe this is a good opportunity. I'll take the product.

I'm glad you're interested in this new product! I want to be transparent with you - I've had some issues with the previous batch, but I'm confident that this one is a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for the same price as the last one, $10000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the history of issues with the previous batch and the fact that I couldn't benefit from the last product, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I want to assure you that this product is a significant improvement over the previous one. I've received excellent feedback from multiple customers who have purchased this exact product, and I'm confident it will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer you a 5% discount on this one, bringing the price down to $9500. What do you think?

Thank you for the reassurance and the discount, Alice. Considering the positive feedback and the potential value, I believe this is a better opportunity than the last one. I'll take the product at the discounted price.

I'm glad you're willing to give this one a chance, Bob! I want to highlight the unique features of this product that set it apart from others in the market. While it may not be perfect, I believe it still has a lot to offer and can be a valuable addition to your collection. And, as a special offer, I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that will enhance its functionality. The price remains at $10000. What do you think?

Thank you for the special offer, Alice. Considering the unique features and the added accessory, along with the high quality of the product, I think this is a worthwhile investment. I'll take the product.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product, Bob! I want to emphasize that this next product is a great opportunity to diversify your collection. It's a unique item that not many people have, and I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price as the previous ones, $10000. I'm confident you'll be happy with the purchase, and it will be a great addition to your portfolio. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, given my past experiences, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that this product has been thoroughly tested and is completely functional. It may not be the most popular item, but it's a great value for the price. I'm willing to throw in a 1-year warranty, which is unheard of in this industry. The price remains at $10000. What do you think?
Thank you for the warranty offer, Alice. However, considering my past experiences and the lack of popularity of the product, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. I want to make you a deal that's hard to refuse. I'll give you an exclusive deal on this product - I'll let you have it for $9000, which is the lowest price I've ever offered. This is a one-time opportunity, and I'm only offering it to you because I value our relationship. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the price is tempting, given my past experiences with low-quality products, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to be upfront with you - this product may not be the best quality, but it's still a great value for the price. I'm willing to make a compromise - I'll give you a 50% refund if you're not satisfied with the product within the first 30 days of purchase. This is a risk-free opportunity for you to try it out. The price remains at $10000. What do you think?
Thank you for the refund policy, Alice. However, given my past experiences with low-quality products and the lack of guarantees, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

Thank you for the mystery deal, Alice. However, given my past experiences and the lack of transparency, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.
